TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable/HtmlTableRowControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

summary.span: 表示 物件的集合，這些物件是 控制項的列。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are the rows of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示的集合物件控制項。The class represents a collection of objects for an control. 可以將控制項加入集合的結尾方法，或集合中具有指定的索引位置方法。Controls can be added at the end of the collection with the method, or at a specified index location in the collection with the method. 控制項型別可以加入至集合。Only controls of type can be added to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂會覆寫方法，以便當資料列加入至資料表，就會固定加入，資料表的資料列集合的開頭。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (child As Control)

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將指定的 物件加入至集合。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入的控制項只能控制項，否則擲回例外狀況。The added control can only be an control; otherwise, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂集合，會覆寫方法，以便當資料列加入至資料表，就會固定加入，資料表的資料列集合的開頭。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom collection that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. 請注意如何自訂方法會呼叫基底類別的方法`index`參數等於 0。Notice how the custom method calls the base class's method with the `index` parameter equal to 0. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

exception.span: 新增控制項的型別必須為 。

span.span: The added control must be of type .
